data.what_is:
Supporting 80+ OEMs and thousands of dealers with an array of marketing and technology solutions, Aimbase is the only marketing technology solution in the recreation and industrial equipment industries that combines enterprise lead management, marketing automation, and customer lifecycle management in ONE platform.

OEMs utilize Aimbase as their go-to solution to manage and track the entire customer journey from pre-purchase through re-purchase, measure dealer sales and quoting performance and implement customer satisfaction programs.
data.product_description: AVALA combines research and analysis, technology, creativity, and overall brand strategy to provide our clients with everything they need to maximize sales.The Aimbase platform is unique compared to the competition because it is one of the only marketing automation technologies on the market to effectively manage the pre-sale and post-sale phases of the customer lifecycle for manufacturers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very powerful reporting, easy to use
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Aimbase?
Easy to generate complex and powerful reports; clean interface is mostly intuitive and easy to use; was able to pick up and run with this software with limited training or support, with very few issues.

What do you dislike about Aimbase?
Options to simplify report views might be nice. Faster/more responsive interface would make time consuming tasks less tedious.

What problems is Aimbase solving and how is that benefiting you?
Massive customer database with multiple marketing channels feeding data into the system. AimBase makes all of that usable for us at the dealer level, without any outstanding issues. We're able to use it to greatly improve our marketing efforts.
